original_text: But the people in the village would not let him stay there. This was because he was going to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 예수께서 예루살렘을 향하여 가시기 때문에 그들이 받아들이지 아니 하는지라

sentences.original_text: But the people in the village
would not let him stay there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그곳에 머무는 것을 허락하지 않았다.
